pp

Class Unit

  • java.lang.Object
    • pp.Unit

  • public class Unit
extends java.lang.Object
    Unit class enables to access data of units. To get an instance of a Unit, use getUnitAt from PP class.
    Author:
    Mathieu Muratet

            throws PPException

                                  throws PPException,

        Returns:

        public float getHealth()
                throws PPException
        Returns:
        Health of this unit.

      • getMaxHealth

        public float getMaxHealth()
                   throws PPException
        Returns:
        maximum health that this unit can reach.
        Throws:
        PPException - on errors linked with Prog&Play.

      • getGroup

        public int getGroup()
             throws PPException
        Returns:
        group number of this unit. a negative value is returned, if this unit isn't associated to a group.
        Throws:
        PPException - on errors linked with Prog&Play.

      • setGroup

        public void setGroup(int g)
              throws PPException
        Allocates the unit to a specified group. Only units controled by the player can be affected to a group.
        Parameters:
        g - allocation group (g >= 0).
        Throws:
        PPException - on errors linked with Prog&Play.

      • removeFromGroup

        public void removeFromGroup()
                     throws PPException
        Removes the unit from its group. Only units controled by the player can be removed from a group.
        Throws:
        PPException - on errors linked with Prog&Play.

      • getPendingCommands

        public java.util.ArrayList<PendingCommand> getPendingCommands()
                                                       throws PPException
        Returns pending commands of this unit. Only units controled by the player can give this data.
        Returns:
        the vector of pending commands of this unit.
        Throws:
        PPException - on errors linked with Prog&Play.

      • command

        public void command(int action,
           Unit target)
             throws PPException
        Commands the unit to carry out action on a specified unit. Only units controled by the player can receive this command.
        Parameters:
        action - action to carry out.
        target - target unit.
        Throws:
        PPException - on errors linked with Prog&Play.

      • command

        public void command(int action,
           java.awt.geom.Point2D target)
             throws PPException
        Commands a unit to carry out action on a specified position. Only units controled by the player can receive this command.
        Parameters:
        action - action to carry out.
        target - target position.
        Throws:
        PPException - on errors linked with Prog&Play.

      • command

        public void command(int action,
           float param)
             throws PPException
        Commands a unit to carry out an untargeted action. Only units controled by the player can receive this command.
        Parameters:
        action - action to carry out.
        param - parameter to the action. If any parameter required, put -1.0 instead.
        Throws:
        PPException - on errors linked with Prog&Play.
